dedicatedCloud_datacenter_backup_new_des: You have not enabled a backup service yet
You can choose between 3 new solutions to back up your virtual machines (VMs): Standard, Advanced and Premium.
The solution chosen for this datacentre will be the only one available for the other datacentres in this Private Cloud, and the only one applicable to all of your virtual machines.
